key.name: panel-position
key.summary: Choose the position of the workspace indicator.

key.name: skip-taskbar-mode
key.description: Set to true to ignore `is_skip_taskbar` windows when determining in-use workspaces. This includes hidden windows created by the desktop-icons-ng extension.

key.name: change-on-click
key.description: Set to true to change to the workspace number on indicator click. Set to false to disable any action on click.
